review: I've taken this medication 5 times in the past 2 years.  Take this in the middle of a big meal and what helps the most, I put the pills inside mini marshmallows and swallow it down with water so I don't taste it.  500mg twice a day, tolerate it well, awful taste in mouth if I don't use the marshmallow technique.

Flagyl (metronidazole):The reviews I saw for this drug scared the hell out of me. I was dealing with stomach issues for months before finally going to the doctor for it. I had every symptom of H pylori and a blood test confirmed it. I started out with clarithromycin and I had an awful experience I had every single side effect. I switched to Flagyl. I had a 14-day treatment with one pill every 8 hours. I'm 19 and weighted 115. After the medicine, I now weigh 108 but feel better than I ever have before. YOU NEED THIS!! The treatment is not as bad as everyone says. Remember to take Probiotics. The first week was great, the only side effects I had were loss of appetite, diarrhea, and my urine was a much darker color. I never had a bad metallic taste but my tongue felt coated like something was constantly at the back of my throat. Eating and drinking helped with that. My GI doctor prescribed me protonx, zofran, and levsin before the treatment which seemed to really help while also taking the antibiotics.

Flagyl (metronidazole):I have taken this medicine 3 times this year I took it in late July and did ok with it. Not even a week later I had a rash went to the doctor it was shingles. Took it again in early October 250mg 4 times a day. I thought I was going to die. Very moody trouble remembering things rapid heart rate my blood sugar dropped one evening and I’m not a diabetic. My skin felt like it was crawling I stopped taking it on  Wednesday night woke up Thursday morning with yet another rash and yet again SHINGLES! I will never take this medicine again

I was diagnosed with h pylori for the second time in 5 years following a stool test confirming the bacteria. I was put on clarithromycin 500 mg metronidazole 500 mg and omeprazole 20 mg twice daily. The first couple of days went well just the bitter taste that everyone describes. I’m on day 6 of a 10 day treatment plan and today I feel so awful. I couldn’t sleep last night had severe insomnia stomach cramps and burning also anxiety. I hope that it’s just the pills getting rid of the bacteria because it was so random and I know these drugs are wreaking havoc on me. I hope this will be all worth it in the end. Got a follow up a month from now

I’m taking metronidazole 500 mg, I’m also taking prilosec otc 40 mg and clarithromycin 500mg. I have diarrhea, black stools, ringing in the ears, my vision is weird (maybe brain fog I don’t know) and weak , chest pain that won’t go away, high heart rate.  I had a left side spasm yesterday and it was really weir . I didn’t care for it. I don’t know what to do. I don’t want to take this but I don’t want to have h pylori . My muscles feel weak

Worsen the symptoms that I have before the metronidazole. I have  side effects of a metallic taste, stomach upset, insomnia, much too tired, pain in all body, anxiety, joint pain and especially knee pain specially. Now I am on 11 day of 14 day so have 3 days left. I hope my stomach bug is removed after this course.

Flagyl (metronidazole):One of the worst meds I've ever had the misfortune to use. In addition to making me feel continuously nauseous, it affects the saliva in your mouth. Your saliva is as if you have chewed on the most possible bitter thing you can think of.  Saliva is bitter 24/7 which in turn causes what little food you can tolerate taste wretched.Dosage was three times a day for 14 days. After day 7 days I reduced it to twice a day, which has helped the symptoms of nausea and bitter saliva a little, which is better than nothing. Otherwise I would have stopped taking it all together. I'm depending on the Clarithromyacin  to pick up the slack.

I began taking omeprazole, clarithomycin, metronidazole, and amoxicillin. I am now on my last day (14 days total). The first few days were okay but within a week they improved. Side effects were just uncomfortable but not bad, diarrhea, insomnia, dizziness, metallic taste in mouth,  headache, heartburn, and nausea. My side effect symptoms come and go. Advice: If you are reading these experiences please try not to stress as much as everyone is different. I find that taking a probiotic helps a lot to reduce stomach discomfort and diarrhea. Make sure to eat light throughout the day and change your diet to mainly BRAT diet ( bland ) as well as prebiotic foods, this will let your ulcers heal as well as avoiding bloating and other stomach discomfort. Avoid alcohol at all costs as well as sugar and bread because they promote the growth of H pylori. Eat 2-4 hours before you go to bed or lay down and keep your head and torso propped up because it helps digestion as well as avoiding GERD symptoms.

I took Flagyl 400 x 2 for 7 days and I will outline what I experienced. 1 - They made me feel very sick all day every day. 2 - I was never off the toilet. 3 - I felt very low in mood, agitated and argumentative.4 - Fatigued, never felt so tired.5 - My legs ached from groin to my knees. 6 - My lymph nodes in my groin and neck swelled up. 7 - The skin on my hands peeled. 8 - I lost around 4 - 6 kilos.9 - Taste in my mouth was disgusting.10 - I couldn't sleep.11 - I felt unsafe driving as I was so tired and dizzy.Finished these a few days ago and I called my GP to report to check these side effects were normal... simply put they said yes. Should clear up in 5 - 7 days!!Today my legs still ache, I am exhausted with no energy to do anything. My mood is improving and I'm no longer agitated. My glands are sore in my groin and neck .Hope these wear off soon !!!Good luck taking these and hopefully if you do you'll be feeling better soon.

I was prescribed Metronidazole, doxicicline, Prilosec and bismuth for two weeks to treat h pylori. Metronidazole should be removed completely from the list of antibiotics,I was diagnosed with h-pylori and I hate how this particular antibiotic make me feel, the doctor said take with food, but how when this disgusting pill makes you loose your appetite and when you do take it with food you get nauseated,I threw up,and felt weak...REMOVED METRONIDAZOLE  ITS NO GOOD

Flagyl (metronidazole):Amoxicillin always was so hard on my stomach my stomach - more than h.pylori. A family member told me to get over it because they were an army med. do not get over it. The metronidazole shouldn’t make you feel this way and is truly the cure.

And so I am on  day 5 of 7 on a cocktail of Omeprazole, Amoxicillin and Metronidazole for H pylori. Normally I tolerate antibiotics well but the word I am using for this treatment is grim. Has to be the Metronidazole which is disagreeing with me but it seems my H-Pylori is resistant to Clarithromycin. I have a constant and utterly revolting taste in my mouth which is so bad it makes me nauseous. My tongue feels thicker somehow. Chewing sugar free gum helps but it’s really really really unpleasant. Headaches in the night with some disturbed sleep and, so far, one instance of frankly bizarre and unusually vivid nightmare.

On second therapy after initial 14 day antibiotic treatment failed to rid of h-pylori. First time 140 pills, now a combination of antibiotics totalling 260 pills in 14 days. I am on a PPI, Metronidazole, Tetracycline, and pepto. After taking my 3rd of 4 doses of Metron my head starts pounding. I drink 8oz of water for each of the 8 antibiotics daily plus whatever extra I take from the PPI and regular water consumption outside of the antibiotics. I don’t drink, smoke, or consume caffeine so it’s none of those. I have been a model prescription medicine taker and followed the instructions to a T. Anything after noon, when I take my third dose of this medication, is downhill. I basically become a vegetable. I’m on day 4, I don’t remember what side effects I had last treatment but I do remember by the end of it I was ready to throw in the towel and lock myself in a closet to cry my eyes out. Side effects: Irritability Fatigue NauseaHeadachesLoss of appetitemoody

So far I’ve had no side effect except for acid reflux/heartburn. I’m on day 5 out of a 10 day course and can’t wait to get rid of this nasty bug. I’m taking the H pylori combination of Omeprazole, Clarithromyxin, metronidazole and pepto bismuth.

Flagyl (metronidazole):I'm on day three  out of 1t day of taking a three tier medication schedule for h pylori, metronidazole, erythromyacin, and omeperazole. My doc suggested that I take one of the antibiotics, eat something, wait an hour, then take the second one. So far I’ve had no bad side effects, only a bad taste in my mouth.

Dr prescribed for 400 mg metronidazole to be taken thrice daily and 500 mg clarithromycin twice daily. Esomeprazole twice daily. This was for 14 days to get rid of Helicobacter Pylori. This absolutely wrecked my body. First day had terrible stomach cramps and constant severe hunger pains. Did not sleep at all from the pain. After two days the cramps went away but was replaced with intense nausea, weakness and a really dry mouth and a constant disgusting taste in my mouth. Could not eat anything after the fifth day. Had to stop taking the drugs on the sixth day and my dr agreed that this was too much to handle. Could only handle fluids the day after stopping the regimen. Was set out to finish my 14 day course as would love to get rid of this bug once and for all but my body couldn't take it anymore. Now hoping five days of intense antibiotics were enough to eradicate H Pylori. Will have to wait a month before retesting. Maybe a lower dose fewer times a day could have helped? But possibly not as effective.

Flagyl (metronidazole):The side effects from flagyl have been worse than my original symptoms of H pylori. Explosive diarrhea, bloating, loss of appetite, urgency and general discomfort. I have two days left of a 10 day/ 3 times a day cycle. I cannot wait for it to be over. Don't take this stuff unless you have to. It has been hard.

I don’t know how effective it is because I’m only on day 6, also taking another antibiotic and Prilosec. I’m so sick, nausea, diarrhea, weak, tired. I really hope it works because I can’t take this much longer!
The first 3 days  on metronidazole where good, then I started getting a funny taste and made me feel really tired

I was prescribed this med for 14 days with clarithromycin, bismuth and omeprazole to treat h pylori. After four days I was having horrific panic attacks in my sleep, severe depression and felt like I was losing my mind. Had to completely stop it. After four days without taking any, am still feeling anxiety, feelings of de-realization, weakness, dizziness, and like I cannot regulate my internal temperature. It is getting a little better but still feel like garbage. I am allergic to penicillin so the doctor wants me to see an allergist so he can prescribe levofloxacin. H Pylori is no joke but these meds are like poison!

I am taking Clarithromycin, Metronidazole 500 mg each along with Dexilant to treat H Pylori for 14 days, I have 3 days left so know I can make it.  My only symptoms have been the metallic taste, really ugly, helps to swallow as quickly as you can before they start to dissolve, it also helps to slowly dissolve a hard candy when the taste gets really bad. Also dark urine, primarily in the morning.  Suggest you drink a lot of water to try to get medication to move through your system more quickly.My last symptom is constipation, am trying   bisacodyl soft gels, has helped somewhat.  Can’t wait to be through and hopefully have this nasty bug out of my system!  Treatment second time in ten years, although hard to tell how long I have had it this time.  Overall stomach issues and indigestion are much better so far.  Not eating much, so that could also explain lack of prior symptoms. Don't forget to get a new toothbrush so you don't reinfect your self.

I want to share my story because when I was prescribed this, then after seeing all the reviews I was very scared. First, some people advised to take it with orange juice which I researched and is a no-no.  Also try to not eat too much fiber during the time you are taking antibiotics, I searched and fiber takes away some of the potency. Take it with plain water and eat some lettuce leaves with it. I got bad after taste which was not that bad only once when I laid down on my right side at night. If you lay on the left side, and you should have not problem.  I am H Pylori free and I plan on staying that way, I changed my whole diet, and lost 10 lbs and feel Great.

Prescribed metronidazole this for H Pylori. This medication made me totally unable to do anything. Extremely Weak muscles and extreme fatigue. Missed work. Two weeks after finishing still battling weakness in my muscles and fatigue. Never will I take it again.

Stopped this drug after 4 days.......had nearly all the side effects as stated online.(Terrible) Take Amoxicillin instead..no side effects and worked for my H Pylori.

I was given 500mg four times a day for H pylori.  The taste was horrible and by day 5 I started to vomit. I called my doctor who refused to return my call. By day 6 I started having stools like water. I stopped the drug on my own. I'll be careful what I take next time.

This drug has not been a good experience for me (I'm on Day 10 of 14) and I really hope it destroys the H. pylori. Two days later she insisted the dizziness and nausea were due to a virus. Today I ordered some Neem & Aloe Vera Inner Gel because there is pretty good information on these two botanicals' impact on H. pylori. Never again.

I been taking it for 4 days, its a 500mg tablet, it was doing good except for the 5th day I had nausea and a burning in my throat. Do take it on an empty stomach which I have except this time I ate about 30mins after

Flagyl (metronidazole):I am now on day 7 of a 14. I'm on Metronidazole, Omeprazole & clarithromycin. I have had H-pylori 3 times with in a year. The treatment for me has been awful. The dosage was tripled and it has given me nausea, bloating, foggy memory, a white film on my tongue & fatigue. The metallic taste last all day. The thing that you need to be aware of is if you continue to get H-pylori like I have, it can be a precursor to stomach cancer. After this round of treatment I have taken the steps to see a gastroenterologist, to insist that he does an endoscopy, to ensure me that there isn't anything for me to be concerned with at this time. It's a very scary feeling to have gotten this infection at least 3 times within a year.

I had to go the hospital. Bending over in pain. It was hurting something in my stomach like it was creating an ulcer. I stopped taking them and got something different. Haven't taken it yet as I'm scared.

I hope this is helpful for those that are taking this medication. I am on day 6 now and I'm feeling better. But the first 3 days my stomach was burning. Make sure you take  a probiotic  2 hours before or after taking this medication. The reason for the stomach burn is that the good bacteria is being destroyed by the METRONIZOLE? so the probiotic replaces the good bacteria that has been lost. Also I take 3 pepto bismol  chewable tablets 1 hour before I take the medication - it really helps out so much. I take this medication twice a day and I take 6 peptobismol in total all day good luck.
Took for 10 days for H. Pylori along with two other medications. Left a slightly odd taste in my mouth and made me a little drowsy. No other significant side effects, and cured me of this nasty bug.

Flagyl (metronidazole):I had a Duodenal Switch (a major weight loss surgery combining the vertical sleeve with rearranging one's intestines to minimize fat absorption) 9 yrs ago.  Since then I've had probs with gas and a stomach ulcer, both caused by H Pylori.  I've taken Flagyl twice.  I am now on Day 5 of this round, & I don't experience most of the side effects I see described.  (250 mg 3X per day) While the pill doesn't "taste" great, there are other meds that also don't, and I find this no more severe than those.  I don't  have a lingering bad taste.  I've had no diarrhea and have had more regular bowel movements.  I've had almost no gas.  My pain is gone.  I don't feel sick.  I am grateful for this drug!
Had no problems at all with this medication I was given 500mg for 10 days to rid h-Pylori. I believe thus far it's done the job. I'm on day 3 of being h-pylori free.. I'm hoping it stays this way.

I've been on this medication(clarithromycin, doxycycline, and omperazole) for nine days now to treat H Pylori and experiencing  Chest pains, bloating, stomach cramps, headaches and dizziness. Five more days of theses uncomfortable side effects and I hope it'll all be over.

Taking it together with tetracycline, pantoprazole (a PPI), and 30ml of pepto.  Taking it all 4x daily for 2 weeks for a confirmed H. pylori infection.Since I started taking it, I experienced mild to severe nausea and bloating.  Occasional cramps, as well.  The metro tastes absolutely awful, and swallowing it right away usually resulted in the pill getting stuck in my throat and dissolving there.  I found that taking it with grape gatorade and letting it sit in the back of my mouth for a few seconds made the experience less awful, but nothing can get rid of the aftertaste.At the time of writing, I still have 5 days left of treatment.  I read on multiple review sites that despite the side effects and taste, treatment generally works.

Taking this medication along side Clarithromycin really caused a bitter metal taste in the mouth... It caused me to produce more spit in my mouth and turned the color of my stool to turn pitch black.... It is prescribed for 14 days being taken 2x a day. Currently on day number 5 and hoping the taste will subside. Here is to a happy health and better stomach.

Had severe pressure in my chest and thought I maybe having a more serious underlying health problem, so ended up going to Dr who in turn immediately wanted to rule out a Pulmanary Embolism (blood clot in lungs) due to symptoms and blood work that showed elevated levels of a D-Dimer test. So she sent me immediately over to ER to have CT and Chest X-ray completed.The ER doctor saw me and ran his usual self examination of me with my symptoms and come to find out I have H-Pylori, bacterial infection in my stomach. Gave me Flagyl 3x daily and Doxycycline 2 daily along with pepto and Prilosec.  I'm on day 4 and my side effects are Severe Bloating, chest pain , and just feeling not myself. The taste is awful, but the cramping is worse.

I hardly have any side effects (day4/5). One positive effect is that I am much more happy.  Not sure what or why. I did have a headache tonight and I felt kind of like I am withdrawing from caffeine.  (I don't drink coffee) Only one occasion of constipation a few days ago but ate a lot of fiber to take care of this.  Urine is darker than normal in the morning & that's with same amount of water a day, average 4 pint glasses per day.This drug seems to have weakened parasite in gut, can't wait to get the other meds. I sleep well and no other side effects.  Maybe some subtle balance problems when walking.
